title: NEW & By The WATER! Gorgeous 2 Bedroom & 2 Bath! NoFee
posting_body: BEAUTIFUL COMPLEX BUILT RIGHT ON THE OCEAN!!
Couple Minutes Drive to Commuter Rail (T), River Works (T), North Shore Community College
15 Minutes to Logan International Airport and Easy Access to Downtown Boston
- Gourmet Kitchen with Designer Finishes / Stainless Steel Appliances / Granite Counters
- High Speed Internet / Work From Home Space and Business Center
- Pet Friendly With Indoor Dog Wash and Play Area
- Breed Restrictions / $35 Monthly Cat / $50 Monthly Dog
- Parking Monthly Extra/$50 Assigned Spot/Assigned Garage Spot $100
This is such a BEAUTIFUL PROPERTY and is WATERFRONT Living at its Finest!!
Easy to Show / No Broker Fee to You
Call Dotty, Agent at Cheever Associates at 781-883-5444
